The monthly repayment amount, monthly flat rate, Annualised Percentage Rate (APR) and total interest amount shown in the calculator are for indication only and are not meant to be final.
The illustration does not reflect the actual allocation of principal and interest. Please also note that the actual monthly repayment amount may differ, customers should refer to the loan confirmation letter for the actual related information.
The monthly repayment amount and the APR is calculated based on a 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42, 48, 54 or 60-month repayment period and loan amount of every HKD10,000. The monthly repayment amount is rounded up to one decimal place.
The APR is calculated using method specified in relevant guidelines issued by The Hong Kong Association of Banks, and is rounded up or down to the nearest two decimal places. An APR is a reference rate, which includes all applicable interest rates, fees and charges of the product, expressed as an annualised rate.

Things you should know
Eligibility
To be eligible for HSBC Electric Vehicle Personal Instalment Loan, you must:
be a Hong Kong resident
be at least 18 years old
have a monthly income of at least HKD5,000
not have other car loan applications for the electric vehicle and you haven't paid for the vehicle in full
In addition to the general documents required to process a loan application, other documents you'll need to provide:
Prior to loan drawdown, provide past 6 months' proof of the order agreement or documents showing the payment of deposits for the purchase of eligible electric vehicle3
Footnote link 3
Within 6 months after loan drawdown, provide vehicle registration document or related documents as proof of electric vehicle ownership4

Notes
Only applicable to customers who have successfully applied for and drawn down the loan during the promotional period which commences on 14 Dec 2023 and ends on 30 Jan 2024, both dates inclusive (the 'Promotional Period') with an approved loan amount of HKD1,500,000 or above. Based on a monthly flat rate of 0.08%, the Annualised Percentage Rate (APR) would be 1.80% over a repayment period of 12 months. The APR is calculated using method specified in relevant guidelines issued by The Hong Kong Association of Banks, and is rounded up or down to the nearest two decimal places. An APR is a reference rate, which includes all applicable interest rates, fees and charges of the product, expressed as an annualised rate. The interest rate that will apply and the amount of interest that will be charged are calculated based on the approved loan amount and the repayment period. If your loan application cannot fulfil our credit requirement, the Bank may still process your application on a case-by-case basis, but the interest rate, handling fee, repayment period and/or promotional offer may be adjusted. The Bank will inform you on the finalised loan details. If you accept the loan details, we will credit the loan into your repayment account according to normal procedure.
To be eligible for a cash rebate of HKD300 under the Document Submission Offer, customers must submit the supporting document(s) that we require for a loan application, and a loan of HKD100,000 or above must be approved during the promotional period.
To be eligible for a cash rebate of up to HKD7,500 under the Successful Application Offer, customers must submit a loan application of at least HKD50,000, and the loan must be approved during the promotional period.
Cash rebates will be credited to customers' loan repayment account only after the customer has provided all documents required for the Electric Vehicle Personal Instalment Loan application, including the vehicle registration document or related documents as proof of electric vehicle's ownership.
For a repayment period of 60 months, customers are entitled to a HKD2,200 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD50,000 to less than HKD200,000, or a HKD3,700 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD200,000 to less than HKD500,000, or a HKD7,200 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD500,000 or above; or
For a repayment period of more than 24 months to less than 60 months, customers are entitled to a HKD1,700 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD50,000 to less than HKD200,000, or a HKD3,000 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD200,000 to less than HKD500,000, or a HKD4,700 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD500,000 or above; or
For a repayment period of 24 months, customers are entitled to a HKD1,500 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD50,000 to less than HKD200,000, or a HKD2,500 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD200,000 to less than HKD500,000, or a HKD3,000 cash rebate for an approved loan amount of HKD500,000 or above.
Total purchasing price for the electric vehicle must be shown on the proof.
The proof must show that the purchaser / owner of the electric vehicle is the applicant.
For details of eligible electric vehicle models, please refer to the Environmental Protection Department's website
Environmental Protection Department's website This link will open in a new window
.
As long as it's an eligible model, both brand new and second-hand vehicles from any manufacturers or dealers are qualified for an HSBC Electric Vehicle Personal Instalment Loan.
The registration date of car ownership must be after the loan drawdown.
The proof must show that the purchaser / owner of the electric vehicle is the applicant.
If the related proof cannot be provided, the Bank reserves the right to terminate this loan. If the Bank exercises that right, the customer should immediately repay the outstanding loan balance, early repayment fee, late charge, overdue interest, accrued interest, repayment of any applicable promotional offers and other fees, etc.
For the first 3 months' introductory interest rate period, interest rate is 1.90% p.a. and Annualised Percentage Rate (APR) is 1.91% for all approved credit limits. "First 3 months' introductory interest rate period" refers to the period from the date of loan disbursement to the third statement date of the respective account (both dates inclusive). For interest rate from the 4th month onwards (p.a), APR and your applicable interest rate, please call our hotline 27488080 or log on to Online Banking. The APR is calculated using method specified in relevant guidelines issued by The Hong Kong Association of Banks, and is rounded up or down to the nearest two decimal places. An APR is a reference rate, which includes all applicable interest rates, fees and charges of the product, expressed as an annualised rate.
Important information 
To borrow or not to borrow? Borrow only if you can repay!
Please note that we do not appoint any third parties to refer Electric Vehicle Personal Instalment Loan applications to us and will not process any application that was referred by a third party under beneficial arrangement. For enquiry, please call our hotline at (852)2233 3000
